name: my favorite farm animals - no ads
name_original: my favorite farm animals - no ads
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
This is a bowling game designed for young children. Your child can play alone or with a friend. Every time your child completes a level he earns a farm animal image. It can free up to 20 pictures of farm animals available in the collection.

second game:
This is a simplified curling game for children. To earn the maximum possible points, we must put the puck closest to the center. To win you must make a certain score in a limited time. Every time your child completes a level he earns a farm animal image. It can free up to 20 pictures of farm animals available in the collection.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- World fit for children.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of farm animals to be released.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
